definition: throwing the embroidered ball (traditional Zhuang flirting game at festivals)/(fig.) to make overtures/to court
to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

sentences.english: Visitors join an bride selection activity in Millennium City Park in Kaifeng.
sentences.chinese: 游客们在参加抛绣球招亲活动。

sentences.english: A girl is throwing an embroidered ball to a lad.
sentences.chinese: 图为一姑娘正在向小伙子抛绣球。

definition: to invite the groom (who will live with the bride's family)/to take a wife by one's own choice
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地
to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
(of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
to parade sb through the streets/to march or parade in the streets
ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment
palanquin with eight carriers/(fig.) lavish treatment
